1205610.name: Clones Run
1205610.description:
A brand-new puzzle action game where you gather Clone humans and lead them to the goal!

You'll face many tricks and gimmicks, like blocks that can only be moved with a certain number of clones. Collect as many hidden coins as you can and aim for the goal!

Features

  • Control the blue Clone humans and head for the goal!

  • White Clone humans are scattered throughout the stage. Find them and make them your allies!

  • The stages are packed with gimmicks like moving blocks and elevators!

  • Try to minimize sacrifices among the Clone humans!

  • Some blocks require a specific number of clones to move!

  • Each stage has 3 hidden coins! Gather as many as you can before reaching the goal!

  • 9 meticulously designed stages are waiting for you!

Controls

Controller

  • Left Stick: Move

  • Right Stick: Rotate camera (left/right), zoom (forward/backward)

  • B: Jump

  • Y: Gather Clone humans

Keyboard

  • WASD: Move

  • Arrow Keys (←→): Rotate camera

  • Arrow Keys (↑↓): Zoom camera

  • Space: Jump

  • E: Gather Clone humans
